title: Jaankaar Bharat
description:
Struggling to navigate Indian government processes or understand welfare schemes? JaankaarBharat.com is here to make it simple. Ask any question in any Indian language, and get accurate, fact-based answers powered by information directly sourced from government data.

Be a Part of the Change!
🚀 Upvote Jaankaar Bharat on Product Hunt and support our mission to make government processes and schemes simple for all Indians.
